channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: He didn't write the tax and spending bill, but it shares his vision for government
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers speaks with McKay Coppins, who recently profiled Russell Vought in the Atlantic. Vought is a key player in the Trump administratio...

item.title: Immigrants with no criminal convictions represent sharpest growth in ICE detention population
item.description: The number of people in ICE detention without criminal convictions nearly doubled in the last month — a significant increase compared to detainees who...

item.title: 4 killed, 14 wounded in River North mass shooting
item.description: The drive-by shooting apparently happened as people left Artis Lounge nightclub following an album release party for rapper Mello Buckzz.

item.title: American teen pilot detained on small island in Antarctica
item.description: Ethan Guo, 19, had flown his plane across the six other continents before he was arrested, according to his social media.

item.title: Texas family's dream vacation turns into nightmare after man nearly cut in half by boat propeller
item.description: Whitney Slough said her husband and their two daughters were snorkeling about 20 feet from the beach when a small boat appeared along the shoreline.

item.title: Trump says he'll host a UFC fight on White House grounds next year
item.description: President Trump plugged a "championship" UFC fight on the White House grounds next year.

item.title: Ex-NBA player Ben McLemore found guilty of rape by Oregon jury
item.description: Ben McLemore was found guilty by a Portland-area jury of raping a woman at a party attended by many of his then-Portland Trail Blazer teammates.

item.title: US expands militarized zones to 1/3 of southern border, stirring controversy
item.description: Annexed militarized zones will soon cover nearly one-third of the U.S. border with Mexico, empowering soldiers to arrest people who cross the border i...

item.title: Russia becomes first state to recognise Afghanistan's Taliban government
item.description: The foreign minister in Kabul called Moscow's decision "courageous".

item.title: Supreme Court to decide if states can ban transgender girls in sports
item.description: The Supreme Court has agreed to hear two cases in the fall that test state laws banning transgender women and girls from participating in sports at pu...

item.title: How Trump's tax cut and policy bill aims to 'supercharge' immigration enforcement
item.description: The bill includes a major federal investment for President Trump's mass deportation plans, while also limiting eligibility for some safety net program...

item.title: Congress passed no tax on tips in Trump's 'big, beautiful bill.' Here's how it works

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ lawyers say he is a changed man. Will that spare him from more time behind bars?
Boxer Julio Cesar Chavez Jr arrested by US immigration
item.description: The boxer, who fought against Jake Paul on Saturday, is accused of ties to the Sinaloa drug cartel.

item.title: Congress passes Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' cutting taxes and spending
item.description: The president wins over sparring factions within his own party to get the bill passed after months of wrangling.

item.title: Gaza aid contractor tells BBC he saw colleagues fire on hungry Palestinians
item.description: The Israel- and US-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation has strongly denied the allegation.
